code: import React,{useState}from'react';import paymentService from'../../services/paymentService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PaymentGateway=()=>{const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handlePayment=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const res=await paymentService.processPayment({amount});setStatus(res.status||'Payment processed');}catch(err){setStatus('Payment failed');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-md mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Payment Gateway"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handlePayment,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2",placeholder:"Enter amount",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded",disabled:loading,children:loading?'Processing...':'Pay Now'})]}),status&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-100 p-4 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Status:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:status})]})]});};export default PaymentGateway;
